text:
Came for a few procedures and couldn’t be happier for the care Dr Woo and his team gave me.

Had a revision surgery today under LA and that was when I felt that I need to finally give a review. Dr Woo constantly asked if I am ok, if I feel any pain. Friendly doctor and team!

Dr Woo is a very nice & professional doctor. He is knowledgeable and patient as well. Provides good advice. Nurses at the clinic are also friendly and approachable.

Great service! Will 100% recommend to my friends if they are keen!

Dr. Evan’s attention to detail is truly exceptional, and I’m incredibly grateful to have found him. I couldn’t be happier with the results of my reduction mammoplasty—my only regret is not seeing him sooner! The entire experience was made even better by the warm and attentive nursing staff, who were always helpful and friendly.

I am incredibly grateful for the exceptional care I received from Dr. Evan Woo and his dedicated team. Dr. Evan Woo is not only highly skilled but also precise in his diagnosis and follow-ups, ensuring that no detail is overlooked. His thoroughness gave me great confidence in my treatment plan.

A special shoutout to the amazing nursing staff who truly go above and beyond! They were passionate, kind, and always on top of arranging appointments, surgery scheduling, and offering the right advice whenever I needed it. Their support made the entire process so much smoother.

Thank you, Dr. Evan Woo and your incredible team, for the outstanding care!

I had a breast reduction surgery with Dr. Evan Woo and I’m very thankful for the exceptional care I received. Dr. Woo’s expertise and attention to detail were remarkable, making me feel confident and comfortable throughout the process. His administrative team was equally amazing, offering thorough guidance with insurance claims, sending timely reminders, and providing all the support I needed. The surgery was a complete success, and the post-op care, including scar management, was excellent. I highly recommend Dr. Woo and his team to anyone considering this procedure—you’ll be in the best hands!
